1370: Cesarius was born in Goetscalcstraet in 1370.
Got married to Pietersen at age 31 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Pietersen, Cesarius, at age 32.
1373: Had a son with Pietersen, Symon, at age 34.
Lost son Cesarius when Cesarius was 3 years old.
1374: Had a daughter with Pietersen, Myrthel, at age 35.
1377: Lost daughter Myrthel when Myrthel was 4 years old.
1378: Had a son with Pietersen, Walic, at age 39.
1379: Lost his wife Pietersen while she was giving birth to Anselmi in 1379.
